item.title: ZACLOG/001 - My Philosophy
item.description: Zombies aren’t merely the walking dead. They are any force destructive to our world. Eaters of the planet, the body, the mind, and the spirit. That’s why I still build things. Especially now. The things I create remind me of the world we lost, but also the world as it could be again. Just because everything has gone to hell in a handbasket, doesn’t mean we have to give in to the bastards. Don’t ever give in, kid.

item.title: ZACLOG/000 - The Zombie Apocalypse Computer
item.description:
Or, the Zero-Infrastructure Autonomous Computer, if you prefer.

ZAC is a self-contained, open-source survival computer designed to function completely off-grid.

Built around a Raspberry Pi architecture, ZAC lives in a weatherproof Pelican case. Solar and battery powered. No internet required. No cloud dependencies. No subscriptions. A standalone, civilization-in-a-box machine, constructed to outlast the zombie apocalypse.
